name: RN apps: ANDROID ONLY - Share extension - Share from Microsoft apps

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)
customFields.Update notes: 04/28/21 - Lindy - Updated to N/A for Rainforest as cannot use share extension in RF.

inline.description:
RN Share extension: Android share from Microsoft apps
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. On Android, open Microsoft Word
  2. Select to share a Word file to Mattermost using share extension
  3. Change to different channel and/or team to share the file to and post

customFields.Important notes about this step: You can find test files here: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1xGCy3tp9A_WxOfdgAzBHzrqJ1WCyfSjW
